text: The Seventh Legislative Yuan was a session of the Legislative Yuan of Taiwan from 1 February 2008 to 31 January 2012. Members were elected to constituency (district) seats in the 12 January 2008 legislative election. The next legislative election took place in January 2012. Wang Jin-pyng (KMT), speaker of Legislative Yuan (Party list) John Chiang (KMT, Taipei City 3) Lin Shu- fen (DPP, Taipei County 2) Hsu Yao-chang (KMT, Miaoli 2) Yen Chin-piao (NPSU, Taichung County 2) Wu Den-yih (KMT, Nantou 1) William Lai (DPP, Tainan City 2) Huang Chao-shun (KMT, Kaohsiung City 1) Fu Kun-chi (KMT, Hualien) Liao Kuo- tung (Sufin Siluko) (KMT, Lowland aborigines) Chai Trong-rong
